song.title: I Failed Again
song.info:
[i]Lyrics:
My fate has beaten me again, My dreams have vanished, all is gone, Now I'm back where I've begun.
There's nowhere left to go, No more words to pray, That's the price I have to pay.
I am walking in the shadows of the night All the beauty torn apart, By my only friend, the dark.
I failed again, I am bound to a life Of everlasting Pain.
I am walking in the shadows of the night All the beauty torn apart.[/i]
